title: Southampton 0-5 Brentford: Key stat
title_page: Southampton 0-5 Brentford: Key stat - BBC Sport
maintext: Southampton have won just six points from their opening 20 Premier League matches this season (W1 D3 L16), equalling the worst points tally by any side at this stage of a campaign in the competition (Sunderland in 2005-06).
